src_original: Vin_2.1538 / nānena dānapatīnāṃ vihāre deyatvasya noktatā [26b3] navasya bhikṣave niddeyatvena /
Vin_2.1539 / bhāṇḍārthe layanasaniyojanaṃ /  Vin_2.1540 / pṛthaktvena mṛttāmrabhāṇḍikayor nikṣepaḥ /
Vin_2.1541 / upasthāpanaṃ pānīyasya /
Vin_2.1542 / na yatra kvacana sthāpanam* /
Vin_2.1543 / maṇḍapasya tadarthaṃ karaṇaṃ /
Vin_2.1544 / dakṣiṇapaścime vihārasya pārśve bhyantarataḥ /
Vin_2.1546 / vaṃśrasya ca pariśrāvaṇasthāpanārthaṃ /  Vin_2.1547 / kāṣṭha(m)mañjikāsu sthāpanaṃ /  Vin_2.1548 / iṣṭakapiṇḍikāyām vā /
Vin_2.1549 / ādhārakeṣu /  Vin_2.1550 / caukyaṃ pānīyabhāṇḍam āpāribhogokārthāt kuryāt* /
Vin_2.1553 / nākalpikair enad hastacīvaraiś cārayet* /  Vin_2.1554 / [26b5] kālena kālam udakabhāṇḍānām antaḥśocanam* /
// [iti] vitaṇḍanā // 10 //  **(Vin_2,4,11) anuparatāvacchedane /  Vin_2.988 / chedayen navaka[19a4]rmiko vṛkṣaṃ stūpasaṃghārtham /
Vin_2.989 / prāka tataḥ saptāṣṭeṣu divaseṣv atas tasya maṇḍalakagandhapuṣpadīpadhūpabalidānatridaṇḍakaṃ
bhāṣaṇadakṣiṇadeśanāṃ kṛtvā yā devatā 'smin vṛkṣe 'dhyuṣitā sā 'nyad bhavanaṃ samanveṣatvanena  vṛkṣeṇa stūpasya saṃghasyeti-karaṇīyaṃ bhaviṣyatīty uktā jānīhi vādena /
Vin_2.990 / vikāraś ced agnimokṣarudhirasyandanaśākhākampanapatraśaṭanādir udṛśyeta pakṣe 'tra [19a5] dānamātsaryayoḥ saṃvarṇanivivarṇanaṃ kuryāt

Vin_2.1064 / paudgalike ca /  Vin_2.1065 / uttaratra ca catuṣke /  Vin_2.1066 / naivāspṛśyatāyām /  Vin_2.1067 / piṇḍāya cet praviṣajyāpraviṣṭe vātavarṣam āgacched vihārasthāḥ praveśayeyuḥ /  Vin_2.1068 / āhṛtya praviṣṭaṃ āgacchet /  Vin_2.1069 / naitad arthatāyām adoṣo hvāso vā /
Vin_2.1070 / vismṛtya ced bahusamatikrāntādhvano gato vā smṛtiṃ labheta na bhūya evaṃ kariṣyāmīti cittam utpā[20b1]dayed vācaṃ ca bhāṣeta /
Vin_2.1071 / pratipathitañ ced bhikṣum ārāgayedudhārāyainaṃ prārthayet /
Vin_2.1072 / kartṛtvaṃ prāptatāyām atra yena pratijñātaṃ prakramiṣannāvasād asaṃkaṭaprāpto 'bhisaṃkṣipet śayanāsanam /
Vin_2.1073 / prasphoṭya malinañ cet /
Vin_2.1075 / avalokanam anya eva kruvīta bhikṣoḥ /
Vin_2.1076 / abhāve śrāmaṇerasya /
Vin_2.1077 / tasyāpi gṛhapateḥ /
Vin_2.1078 / sarvābhāve caturdiśaṃ [20b2] vyavalokyāpāvaraṇīṃ gopayitvā prakrāmet /
Vin_2.1079 / antaramārge ced bhikṣuṃ paśyet taṃ pradeśam asmai brūyāt /
Vin_2.1080 / dvāre ced antargṛhopanimantraṇāyāṃ badha āgacchet kuḍyasya mūle vṛkṣasya vā nidhāyādhvani praviśet /
Vin_2.1081 / dadyus tatrāsanāni /
Vin_2.1083 / āgārikaḥ śrāmaṇerāṇām etat /  Vin_2.1084 / abhāve cāvalokya gṛhiṇamānayanā[20b3]rtham āgamanam /
Vin_2.1085 / sthāpayeyuḥ gacchan vayam āneṣyāma iti bruvatsu /
Vin_2.1087 / abhāve svayam /
Vin_2.1088 / sarvatāyāṃ gaṇḍim ākoṭya /
Vin_2.1089 / dadyur vihāre /
Vin_2.1091 / bhikṣuś ceṣām ārakṣāyai sthāpayeyuḥ /
Vin_2.1092 / ekānte 'sau tiṣṭhet svakarma kurva[20b4]nn avadhānadānañ ca /
Vin_2.1094 / śocanaṃ nāśitānāṃ vakkasenādbhiḥ /  Vin_2.1095 / snehinopasnānena /  Vin_2.1096 / aśucinā mṛdoṣāṭukena gomayena vā /  Vin_2.1097 / chittir aśuddhau vātasya /
Vin_2.1098 / gṛhiṇā niṣādya praveśitasya dṛṣṭaḥ praveśyatvam /
Vin_2.1099 / jīraś ced glāno vopadhivārikasya /
Vin_2.1101 / glānam avalokayet sarvaḥ /
Vin_2.1103 / na tatrā[20b5]sanaṃ gṛhītvā gacchet /
Vin_2.1104 / upasthāyako glānasya tatrāsanāny upasthāpayet /
Vin_2.1705 / na tad upekṣeta /  Vin_2.1706 / saptāṣṭān divasanetadupavicāre prakra[29a1] / /
Vin_2.1707 / nāsamuditacinnāya svāmy aham iti bruvate dadyāt* /
Vin_2.1708 / anāgame syodhaṃ sāṃghikai gañjopanikṣipet* /
Vin_2.1709 / āṣaṣṭhamāsaparyantā dhārayet* /
Vin_2.1710 / ūrdham anāgatau yat bhūmau buddhasāṃghikayor labdhiṃ* tatropayuktiḥ /
Vin_2.1711 / ayogyatve krayanaṃ yogyasya tena sthāvarasya /  Vin_2.1712 / tadā cet svāmy āgacched anujñānam āyā..ya[29a2]n ichate dadyuḥ /
Vin_2.1713 / vṛddhiñ cet mṛgayed etad eva na bahu manyase yad asmābhiḥ paripālitam iti brūyuḥ /
Vin_2.1725 / gopayitvotrāse gṛhītvā vānuparodhe svasya sāṃghikam* [29a4]staupikañ ca hiraṇyasuvarṇam apakramaṇaṃ /
Vin_2.1726 / srāddhena śrāmaṇereṇa vā /  Vin_2.1727 / abhāve svayam* /  Vin_2.1728 / khananam atra /
Vin_2.1729 / apagate dānam* /

Vin_2.1730 / utpāṭya tadvat* /  Vin_2.1731 / nirdoṣam amānuṣabhavane puṇyanirjātaṃ ced eṣāṃ ratnamayaṃ bhūmisopādānādi /  Vin_2.1732 / bhojane ca bhājanam asambhave nyasya /  Vin_2.1733 / śayanāsanam* ca niṣāde /
Vin_2.1734 / gacched yānena /
Vin_2.1736 / nāṭopavatā /  Vin_2.1737 / na jīrṇaglānābhyāmanyaḥ /

Vin_2.1738 / niṣīded dharmaśravaṇārthaṃ ratnamaye siṃ*hāsane parāhatyānityatāmanasikāreṇa /  Vin_2.1739 / niveśane cāgārikīyāṇīti saṃprekṣya tatprajñaptau /  Vin_2.1740 / suvarṇakhacitakāṃkaṇikāvṛteṣu vastreṣu /  Vin_2.1741 / atra ca maṇipratyupteṣu suvarṇarūpyakhaciteṣu /
praveśayeyur etāni /  Vin_2.1742 [29b1]nākalpikatvam upasthāpitaśāstṛsaṃjñānām āgārikaśrāmaṇerābhāve buddhapra kṛter dharmyārthavaśatayā spṛṣṭau /
Vin_2.1744 / nābharaṇaprāvṛttim bhajet* /
